footer.subtitle: SQW - Land Management Platform
footer.description:
A smart land management platform
Designed for landowners, investors, and general users
To store, analyze, and explore land data efficiently

mode.line1: This information is provided for displaying land plot locations
mode.line2: and for reference with Google Maps only.
mode.line3: It is not a legal document or legal evidence.
